entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Deux-Montagnes
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:10 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sainte-Anne-de-Bellevue 2:00 PM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016
Temperature: 7.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: 1.4°C
Wind: WNW 26 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low zero with patchy frost.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low zero with patchy frost. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
